name: Raiden Legacy
notes: Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above).

files.game: N/A:Please select the Windows installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Raiden Legacy/raidenlegacy.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    app: vcrun2012
    description: Installing vcrun2012
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: false
- task:
    args: /verysilent /suppressmsgboxes
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
